disclosures.entity: Carers Australia; the Australian Paralympic Team; Royal Flying Doctors Service; medical research into children's leukaemia, breast cancer, diabetes, prostate cancer; the Poche Centre for Indigenous Health at Sydney University; and Ronald McDonald House
disclosures.details: Over $5,000,000 raised for good causes.
In 2016, Pollie Pedal raised over $300,000 for Carers Australia (as my national charity) and $18,240 for Bear Cottage (as my local electorate charity)
Soldier On and StreetWork Northern Beaches have agreed to be the national and local beneficiaries in 2017

disclosures.details: Received pro bono legal advice in a defamation case brought by Mr John Setka
Advisory board position for the newly established Ramsay Centre for Western Civilisation
President of Ukraine appointed me to an advisory council
Warringah Remembers committee holds a commemorative service at North Head
Invitation to become a patron of Australians for Constitutional Monarchy
Travelled to New York City and London as a guest of CQS. They provided travel, some hospitality and accommodation.

Attended the Conservative Party Conference in Birmingham as a guest of The Spectator Magazine and they met the cost of travel (including my return flight to Australia), some hospitality and accommodation.
Travelled to Port Moresby to address the Anglicare PNG annual fundraising dinner. Anglicare PNG met the cost of travel, while accommodation and incidentals were covered by Airways Hotel Limited.
An item of jewellery from Bowerhaus given to my wife
Received a selection of Australian wines by Ralston Solutions Proprietary Limited

disclosures.entity: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Foundation, Washington Speakers Bureau
disclosures.details: Invited to attend the Knowledge Summit in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. Costs met by the Foundation and arranged by the Washington Speakers Bureau.
Upgrade on a privately funded return Virgin flight from Sydney to Adelaide.
Invited to participate in the Tour Down Under as a part of the 2017 Beat Cancer Tour. One night's accommodation in Adelaide provided by the Cancer Council, South Australia.
Upgrade on a privately funded return Virgin flight from Sydney to Melbourne (Spouse)

The Alliance for Conservatives and Reformists in Europe (ACRE) sponsored my visit to Europe and the United Kingdom from 4-11 March 2017. The Alliance met the cost of flights as well as accommodation in Warsaw and Brussels.
During the London leg of my visit, the Bow Group met the cost of accommodation.
Pollie Pedal has raised money for various charities

disclosures.entity: Carers Australia, the Royal Flying Doctor Service, Ronald McDonald House, Youth Insearch and the Paralympic Games
disclosures.details: Over $5,500,000 has been raised for good causes
In 2017 Pollie Pedal raised over $410 000 for Soldier On (as my national charity) and over $60 000 for Streetwork (as my local charity)

Mrs Abbott and I travelled to the Middle East from 13 - 21 May 2017. The Australia/Israel and Jewish Affairs Council (AIJAC) sponsored our visit and met the cost of flights, accommodation and ground transport while visiting Israel.
A bottle of wine, given to me by FTI Consulting.
A tie, given to me by Sarina Russo Group.
Received a new Samsonite suitcase from a local supporter
Received a complimentary upgrade to Premium Economy on a privately funded flight from Australia to the UAE (self and spouse).
A bottle of wine, given to me by Arab Bank Australia
Family passes to the Royal Randwick Racecourse Director's Room given to me by Racing NSW.
Accepted an invitation to serve on the international advisory board of the Institute for Free Trade.
Mrs Abbott and I travelled to London in October 2017. The cost of flights, accommodation and ground transport were met by the Global Warming Policy Foundation (GWPF).
Travelled to the United States of America from 28 October – 4 November 2017. The costs of my flights and ground transport were met by the Alliance Defending Freedom (ADF).
Two cycling kits, given to myself and Mrs Abbott by the Sydney Uni Velo Club (SUVelo).
A print given to me by the Australian Monarchist League.
The Tourism Institute provided hospitality for my annual Warringah community Christmas reception.
My wife has accepted the invitation to become a patron of United In Compassion; and both positions are voluntary.
My wife has accepted the invitation to join the board of Kidsxpress; and both positions are voluntary.
Purchased a new motor vehicle.
Personal loan with St George Bank.
A Montblanc pen which I have donated to Soldier On Australia for their future fundraising efforts given by Ceerose Pty Ltd.

disclosures.entity: Carers Australia, Royal Flying Doctor Service, Ronald McDonald House, Youth Insearch, Paralympic Games
disclosures.details: Over $6,000,000 has been raised for good causes
In 2018, Pollie Pedal raised over $460 000 for Soldier On Australia
In 2018, Pollie Pedal raised over $50 000 for Streetwork.
The Strategic Leadership Dialogue sponsored my travel to Israel and the United States of America from 6 - 13 July 2018. The Dialogue also met the cost of my accommodation while in Israel.
Upgrade received on flight returning to Australia from Qantas Airways.
Received an honorarium to speak at an event hosted by Servcorp Limited in New York City recently.
Travelled to The United Kingdom and France in October 2018. The cost of accommodation and some ground transport while in the United Kingdom was met by The Oxford Union.
The cost of flights, along with accommodation and ground transport while in France was met by The New Criterion.

Given a set of three small polished opal stones by one of the local elders during a recent visit to Coober Pedy as Special Envoy for Indigenous Affairs. Valued professionally but not yet assessed over $300.
At a function held recently in my electorate, Sapphire International Marketing Pty Ltd gave my wife a Versace vase. Donated the vase to StreetWork Australia Limited
Received an upgrade on personally-funded travel on a Virgin Australia Airlines flight from Canberra to Sydney on 27 February 2019.
